mapper.sql: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ERR_BNO) AS ROWNUM , ERR_BNO , ERR_CODE, TITLE , CONTENT , WRITER , VIEW_CNT , COMMENT_CNT , REG_DATE , UP_DATE , CATEGORY_NO , ERR_BOARD_THUM FROM ERR_LOG_BOARD
mapper.select:
WHERE TRUE
and TITLE like concat('%', #{keyword} , '%')
and ERR_CODE like concat('%', #{keyword} , '%')
and WRITER like concat('%' , #{keyword} , '%')
and (TITLE like concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') or ERR_CODE like concat('%', #{keyword} , '%'))
and (TITLE like concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') or CONTENT like concat('%', #{keyword} , '%'))
ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC , ERR_BNO DESC LIMIT #{offset} , #{pageSize}
